data.oai_dc:dc: Dataset2a_HBD contains the integer identifiers for date, vegetation type, and plot associated with each chamber session, dateID, vegID, and PlotID are the same as Datecode, Veg, and Plot in Dataset1_HBD, but each row in Dataset2a_HBD corresponds to the chamber session ID (i.e., Group in Dataset1_HBD).
soil CO2 flux|soil respiration|global change experiments|soil carbon|diffusion model
